data.eml:eml: Enchytraeidae (Oligochaeta, Annelida) from a field site in Portugal, with the description of five new species and a redescription of Enchylea heteroducta Nielsen & Christensen, 1963

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schmelz, Rüdiger M., Collado, Rut (2013): Enchytraeidae (Oligochaeta, Annelida) from a field site in Portugal, with the description of five new species and a redescription of Enchylea heteroducta Nielsen & Christensen, 1963. Zootaxa 3647 (2): 307-328, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3647.2.4
